title: Game not opening
body: I'm trying to get League to work on my Mac. After reinstalling and all that, it opens once but quits before I can reach the login page. Just wondering if it is compatible with Mac OS X version 10.8.5? If so, how can I fix this problem?

replies.body:
League is still supported on 10.8.5, but you might be missing some of those 'permission' settings or admin rights so that League can launch normally after that reinstall. Check out these steps on getting those admin settings back in place, but definitely hit me back up if this doesn't help.

https://i.gyazo.com/543f8a9c564a5f93d0229a0e6fd271a6.png
